main.name: Michael Pretorius
main.bio: I am a persistent - dedicated individual, an easy team player & a natural leader which is actively committed to the goals and morals of the organization I represent and progressive on new frontiers. Adapting to new technologies is my speciality, Always incorporating out of the box methods. Leisure activities include cricket and a various range of sports including athletics.I aim to find the opportunity to gain more experience and prove myself to the provider with diligent and perseverant work regardless of the expectation.
main.contactmessage: Fill the forms below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

resume.skillmessage: Develop and deploy full-stack Web3 applications part-time. Aerial photography. Bachelor of Engineering - Mechatronics.

education.description: Academic Top 10 2016 - 2018 | Athletics Reccomendatoin 2019 | First team cricket captain & recommendation for honours | Academic Honours 2019 | Best Performance: EGD 84% | IT Department & Sound / Lighting | Culture figure, Involvement merit | Gauteng Northern Suburbs Cricket 2012 - 2013 | AP Mathematics 2017 - 2018| South African Rifles Association Member 2015

Developing crucial engineering skills to become a sustainable & renewable forward-thinking inventor of the future. 
 Mechatronics is an interdisciplinary branch of engineering that focuses on the engineering of electronic, electrical and mechanical engineering systems, and also includes a combination of robotics, electronics, computer, telecommunications, systems, control, and product engineering
